title: Israel 'adamantly opposes' Polish senate's approval of draft Holocaust law
text:
February 1, 2018 / 10:42 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago Israel 'adamantly opposes' Polish senate's approval of draft Holocaust law Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Israel “adamantly opposes” the Polish senate’s approval on Thursday of draft legislation penalising suggestions of any complicity by Poland in the Nazi Holocaust, the Israeli Foreign Ministry said. 
“Israel views with utmost gravity any attempt to challenge historical truth. No law will change the facts,” ministry spokesman Emmanuel Nahshon said on Twitter. Writing by Dan Williams; Editing by Jeffrey Heller
